entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 15.
